name: Negative Space (itch) (Cukia Kimani)
description:
You are an astronaut, isolated on a space station with minimal possibilities to interact.  

Seemingly mundane actions like opening the fridge or going to the bathroom rip you out of your routine - all of a sudden you find yourself trapped in a feeling, alone with your thoughts. 

A surreal, eery, and existential experience awaits you.

CONTROLS

Use ARROW KEYS to move around.
Press SPACE to interact.

CREDITS

Cukia Kimani
Henrike Lode
Tim Harbour

This game was made in 72h during SA game jam 2018.
